import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import { Helmet } from 'react-helmet-async' import {menuList} from '../menuList' const Menu = () => { console.log(menuList) const [category,setCategory]= useState('pupusas'); const filterMenu = (event)=>{ console.log(event.target) setCategory(event.target.value) const filterBtns = document.querySelectorAll('.filterBtn') filterBtns.forEach(btn=>{ btn.classList.remove('active') }) event.target.classList.add('active') } return (
Menu
Menu
pupusas
{ menuList.map((item)=>( category === item.category ? (
{item.name}
${item.price}
{item.description ? item.description : ""}
) :"" )) }
) } export default Menu
